statements: SELECT * FROM EnergyDistribution;
SELECT zone_name, demand_forecast FROM EnergyDistribution WHERE zone_id = 1;
SELECT zone_name, power_schedule FROM EnergyDistribution ORDER BY zone_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyDistribution WHERE demand_forecast < 100 ORDER BY zone_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(zone_id) AS total_zones FROM EnergyDistribution;
SELECT * FROM EnergyDistribution WHERE zone_id = 10;
SELECT zone_name, demand_forecast FROM EnergyDistribution WHERE demand_forecast > 1000;
SELECT COUNT(zone_id) AS zone_count, AVG(demand_forecast) AS avg_demand FROM EnergyDistribution;
SELECT * FROM EnergyDistribution ORDER BY demand_forecast DESC;
SELECT zone_name, power_schedule FROM EnergyDistribution WHERE zone_name LIKE 'Zone%';
SELECT * FROM PowerSchedule ORDER BY forecast_date DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, power_demand FROM PowerSchedule WHERE zone_id = 1;
SELECT zone_name, capacity FROM Zone WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT schedule_id, zone_id, power_demand, forecast_date FROM PowerSchedule WHERE power_demand < 500;
SELECT * FROM Zone ORDER BY demand_forecast ASC;
SELECT * FROM PowerSchedule WHERE power_demand > 100 ORDER BY forecast_date DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, power_demand, forecast_date FROM PowerSchedule WHERE zone_id = 3;
SELECT PowerSchedule.schedule_id, PowerSchedule.power_demand, Zone.zone_name FROM PowerSchedule INNER JOIN Zone ON PowerSchedule.zone_id = Zone.zone_id;
SELECT MAX(power_demand) AS max_demand, MIN(power_demand) AS min_demand FROM PowerSchedule;
SELECT zone_name, SUM(power_demand) AS total_demand FROM PowerSchedule INNER JOIN Zone ON PowerSchedule.zone_id = Zone.zone_id GROUP BY zone_name;
SELECT * FROM PowerZones;
SELECT zone_name, demand_forecast FROM PowerZones ORDER BY demand_forecast DESC;
SELECT schedule_name, start_time, end_time FROM PowerSchedules WHERE start_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT zone_name, demand_forecast FROM PowerZones WHERE zone_id = 3;
SELECT zone_name, demand_forecast FROM PowerZones WHERE demand_forecast > 1000;
SELECT * FROM PowerZones;
SELECT zone_id, zone_name FROM PowerZones WHERE demand_forecast > 1000;

SELECT PowerZones.zone_name, PowerSchedules.schedule_name FROM PowerZones JOIN ZoneSchedules ON PowerZones.zone_id = ZoneSchedules.zone_id JOIN PowerSchedules ON ZoneSchedules.schedule_id = PowerSchedules.schedule_id;
SELECT zone_id, zone_name, demand_forecast FROM PowerZones ORDER BY demand_forecast DESC;
SELECT PowerZones.zone_name, COUNT(ZoneSchedules.schedule_id) AS schedules_count FROM PowerZones LEFT JOIN ZoneSchedules ON PowerZones.zone_id = ZoneSchedules.zone_id GROUP BY PowerZones.zone_name;
SELECT * FROM Zone;
SELECT zone_name, zone_id FROM Zone;
SELECT * FROM DemandForecast WHERE demand_value > 100;
SELECT forecast_date, demand_value FROM DemandForecast ORDER BY forecast_date DESC;

SELECT Zone.zone_name, PowerSchedule.schedule_name FROM Zone JOIN AssignedSchedule ON Zone.zone_id = AssignedSchedule.zone_id JOIN PowerSchedule ON PowerSchedule.schedule_id = AssignedSchedule.schedule_id;
SELECT * FROM Zone;
SELECT zone_name, zone_id FROM Zone ORDER BY zone_id DESC;
SELECT schedule_name, forecast_date, demand_value FROM PowerSchedule JOIN DemandForecast ON PowerSchedule.schedule_id = DemandForecast.forecast_id;

SELECT assignment_id, zone_name, schedule_name, demand_value FROM AssignedSchedule JOIN Zone ON AssignedSchedule.zone_id = Zone.zone_id JOIN PowerSchedule ON AssignedSchedule.schedule_id = PowerSchedule.schedule_id JOIN DemandForecast ON AssignedSchedule.forecast_id = DemandForecast.forecast_id WHERE demand_value > 100;
SELECT DISTINCT zone_name FROM Zone WHERE zone_name LIKE '%A%';
SELECT * FROM Zone;
SELECT zone_name, demand_forecast FROM Zone WHERE demand_forecast > 100;
SELECT schedule_name, start_time, end_time FROM PowerSchedule ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT Zone.zone_name, EnergyUsage.usage_amount, EnergyUsage.usage_date FROM Zone INNER JOIN EnergyUsage ON Zone.zone_id = EnergyUsage.zone_id;
SELECT Zone.zone_name, DemandHistory.demand_forecast, DemandHistory.forecast_date FROM Zone INNER JOIN DemandHistory ON Zone.zone_id = DemandHistory.zone_id WHERE DemandHistory.demand_forecast < 80;
SELECT * FROM EnergyUsage WHERE usage_amount > 1000 ORDER BY usage_date DESC
SELECT zone_name, demand_forecast FROM Zone JOIN DemandHistory ON Zone.zone_id = DemandHistory.zone_id WHERE demand_forecast < 50
SELECT PowerSchedule.schedule_name, EnergyUsage.usage_amount FROM PowerSchedule JOIN EnergyUsage ON PowerSchedule.schedule_id = EnergyUsage.zone_id WHERE usage_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT Zone.zone_name, DemandHistory.demand_forecast FROM Zone LEFT JOIN DemandHistory ON Zone.zone_id = DemandHistory.zone_id WHERE Consumption.usage_date = '2021-08-15'
SELECT EnergyUsage.usage_amount, DemandHistory.demand_forecast FROM EnergyUsage JOIN DemandHistory ON EnergyUsage.zone_id = DemandHistory.zone_id WHERE EnergyUsage.usage_date = '2021-08-15'
